page.title: 10THE 'ASDA'
page.content: The 'Asda' is a large supermarket built in Pudsey in 1970.Built of brick and concrete with no windows it has a concrete and terrazzo floor.The shopping area covers 54,000sq.ft. with a further 40,000sq.ft for warehousing and staff facilities.260 people work here.There is a tyre depot,a petrol station ,a cafeteria,a cash point and parking for 540 cars.Customers collect a wire trolley as they enter the store and choose their purchases from the shelves,freezers or counters.All goods are labelled and priced.Customers exit through a 'checkout'.An employee enters the type of goods and price into a cash register.This gives the total price,notes the money tendered and works out the correct change. Customers leave with their goods,their change and a receipt.Trolleys can be left in the car park for collection.
